metadata.title: CVE-2024-45593 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Nix is a package manager for Linux and other Unix systems. A bug in Nix2.24 prior to 2.24.6 allows a substituter or malicious user to craft a NARthat, when unpacked by Nix, causes Nix to write to arbitrary file systemlocations to which the Nix process has access. This will be with rootpermissions when using the Nix daemon. This issue is fixed in Nix 2.24.6.

criterions.comment: nix package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
